name: Identify FAS Functional Domains
description: Identifies functional domains within a Fatty Acid Synthase (FAS) sequence and predicts their roles
author: Biomni Synthetic Biology Tools

inputs.name: sequence
inputs.description: The nucleotide or protein sequence of a FAS gene

inputs.name: output_file
inputs.description: Name of the output file to save the detailed domain report

outputs.name: result
outputs.description: Research log summarizing the steps taken and results of the domain analysis
